snippet: The police said Shamel Allen fatally stabbed a livery-cab driver with an umbrella after the two argued over the fare.
abstract: Shamel Allen is arrested on charges of fatally stabbing livery-cab driver Uro Ama Orji with an umbrella to his eye after what investigators say was argument over fare; he is expected to face manslaughter charges for attack in Brownsville, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The police said Shamel Allen fatally stabbed a livery-cab driver with an umbrella after the two argued over the fare.

headline.main: Man Arrested in Stabbing of Cabdriver in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested In Stabbing Of Cabdriver In Brooklyn
